name: Apple

description: Sweet and nutritious bananas, excellent source of potassium.

description: Sweet and juicy grapes, perfect for snacking.

description: Refreshing watermelon, hydrating and perfect for summer.

description: Sweet and tangy pineapple, rich in vitamins and enzymes.

description: Antioxidant-rich pomegranate with sweet-tart flavor.

description: Plump and sweet blueberries, packed with antioxidants for a healthy boost.

description: Juicy and ripe red tomatoes, great for sauces, salads, and sandwiches.

description: Versatile potatoes, perfect for roasting, mashing, or frying.

description: Essential onions, adding flavor to countless dishes.

name: Carrot

description: Crunchy cabbage, ideal for slaws, salads, or cooking in a variety of dishes.

description: Protein-rich black gram, essential for many Indian dishes.

description: Easily digestible green gram, perfect for soups and sprouts.

description: Quick-cooking masoor dal, with a mild, earthy flavor.
